entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
